attributes.action: stop using foreign nationals as scapegoats and deporting them to make the government look good
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government needs to stop deporting every foreign national who has committed a crime and look at the individual case and personal circumstances and not use them as scapegoats

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
